segments.text: So , what's on the menu for dinner tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're not going to make anything to eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You never cook . I always do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you're a better cook than I am .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh please , you need to cook tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you're telling me that you want me to make dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was a hard day . Can you just do this for me tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to go rest for a little bit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll come wake you when it's ready , okay ?
segments.speaker: S1
